trans-unit.source: For Express Settings and DirSync Upgrade
trans-unit.target: For Express Settings and DirSync Upgrade

trans-unit.source: We enable sync (if required) in your Azure AD directory and create the Azure AD account that will be used for the on-going sync operations (the Azure AD Connector account).
trans-unit.target: We enable sync (if required) in your Azure AD directory and create the Azure AD account that will be used for the on-going sync operations (the Azure AD Connector account).

trans-unit.source: We enable sync in your Azure AD directory and create the Azure AD account that will be used for on-going sync operations (the Azure AD Connector account).
trans-unit.target: We enable sync in your Azure AD directory and create the Azure AD account that will be used for on-going sync operations (the Azure AD Connector account).

trans-unit.source: For the Single Sign-on with the AD FS option, we read and configure federation properties in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: For the Single Sign-on with the AD FS option, we read and configure federation properties in Azure AD.
